com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset

Class TopDownMovementPhysicsPreset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset.TopDownMovementPhysicsPreset

  • public class TopDownMovementPhysicsPreset
extends java.lang.Object
    A preset for physics basic top down, 8-directional movement.
    Author:
    Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DynamicBody2D BODY
      The body to apply the movement to.
      private float PPM
      Pixels per meter conversion constant.
      private float speed
      The speed at which the body will travel by.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite
      The sprite used to display the body's position.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TopDownMovementPhysicsPreset(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite, DynamicBody2D body, float speed, float PPM)
      Creates a top-down movement preset by providing the sprite to render, the body to move, the speed to move by, and the pixels per meter conversion.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopDownMovementPhysicsPreset

        public TopDownMovementPhysicsPreset(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite,
                                    DynamicBody2D body,
                                    float speed,
                                    float PPM)
        Creates a top-down movement preset by providing the sprite to render, the body to move, the speed to move by, and the pixels per meter conversion.
        Parameters:
        sprite - The visual representation of the body.
        body - The body to be moved.
        speed - The speed at which the body will move initially.
        PPM - The pixels per meter conversion constant.

    • Method Detail
